title: 07/28/21 DPS Best Of
itunes:title: 07/28/21 DPS Best Of
description:
On Today's Dan Patrick Show, DP's joined by Hall of Fame Broadcaster Bob Costas to discuss his new show on HBO, "Back on The Record with Bob Costas". He shared stories from broadcasting the Olympics and the first baseball game he ever attended. Hall of Fame NASCAR driver Dale Earnhardt Jr. discusses racing on days that mentally he wasn't at his best and what it was like racing the week after his Dad passed away. And ESPN.com Senior writer Ryan McGee calls in to explain why the SEC had a great week.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.

On Today's Dan Patrick Show, DP's joined by Hall of Fame Broadcaster Bob Costas to discuss his new show on HBO, "Back on The Record with Bob Costas". He shared stories from broadcasting the Olympics and the first baseball game he ever attended. Hall of Fame NASCAR driver Dale Earnhardt Jr. discusses racing on days that mentally he wasn't at his best and what it was like racing the week after his Dad passed away. And ESPN.com Senior writer Ryan McGee calls in to explain why the SEC had a great week.
